returns.vaultAddress: Address of the vault where funds were deposited

returns.avgApr: Weighted average APR in basis points

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params.amount: Amount of MUSD to withdraw (0 = withdraw all)

params.shares: Amount of shares to redeem (0 = all shares)

calculateExpectedYield(uint256,address,u.notice: Calculates expected yield over a time period

claimYield().notice: Claims accrued yields without withdrawing principal

deposit(uint256).notice: Deposits MUSD to the optimal yield vault

depositToVault(address,uint256).notice: Deposits MUSD to a specific yield vault

emergencyWithdrawFromVault(address).notice: Emergency withdraw all funds from a vault (admin only)

getAverageApr().notice: Gets weighted average APR across all active vaults

getBestVault().notice: Gets the vault with highest APR

getPendingYield(address).notice: Gets pending yield for a user across all vaults

getPendingYieldInVault(address,address).notice: Gets pending yield for a user in a specific vault

getTotalValueLocked().notice: Gets total value locked across all vaults

getUserPosition(address).notice: Gets user's total position across all vaults

getUserPositionInVault(address,address).notice: Gets user's position in a specific vault

pauseDeposits().notice: Pauses deposits to all vaults (admin only)

resumeDeposits().notice: Resumes deposits to all vaults (admin only)

totalValueLocked().notice: Total value locked across all vaults

withdraw(uint256).notice: Withdraws MUSD and accrued yields from all vaults
